name: Dream Job (DreamJobGame)
description:
Rose's dream came true, she got hired at Poison Games! Follow her on her first day at the job and as she meets her colleagues. 

Dream Job's WebGL build is best played in fullscreen!

Disclaimer: unfortunately we were not able to finish our original vision because of time restrictions, but please, still enjoy! 🤗

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow keys to move.
  • E to talk/take the elevators.
Credits
  • Art: Kasia Sobczyńska
  • Game and level design: Martin Garcia
  • Programming: Sander Vanhove

This game was developed for Code Coven & UN Women UK's Safe Spaces Now jam.
